documents.document: RT @_DearParents_: Raise your child's awareness of the mass media's efforts to brainwash citizens.
A society of sheep must in time beget a government of wolves. ~Bertrand de Jouvenel
Those who suppress freedom always do so in the name of law and order. ~John V. Lindsay
The sin of silence when they should protest makes cowards of men. ~Abraham Lincoln
Everything in a revolutionary is wholly absorbed in the single thought and the single passion for revolution. ~Nechaev
RT @OvertDictionary: Systematic Corruption: bailing out the bondholders even though they hold the paper to our national debt.
Machines were, it may be said, the weapon employed by the capitalists to quell the revolt of specialized labor. ~Karl Marx
If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter. ~George Washington
Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves. ~Abraham Lincoln
RT @MARTlNLUTHERK: It is time for parents to put away the Disney consumer ethic, in favor of political resistance.
When you are right you cannot be too radical; when you are wrong, you cannot be too conservative. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @Reasons2BLazy: The less productive you are for your capitalist employer the more revolutionary you will become.
Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @RebellingSlave: I will stand up to those who crush the bones of my fellow workers.
I want to be the white man's brother, not his brother-in-law. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @Sigymund_Freud: Psychology must be used to make the populace fearless and unafraid of confronting the enemy class.
I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war. ~ MLK
I look to a day when people will not be judged by the color of their skin, but by the content of their character. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @The_RevoIution: I am the spirit of the masses, I am the desire to tear down the psychological barrier erected by the counterrevolutiona…
Human salvation lies in the hands of the creatively maladjusted. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @JFKennedys: Do not empower the fascist business class by voting for the politicians in their pockets.
A riot is the language of the unheard. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
A right delayed is a right denied. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @_Che___Guevara_: Third world citizens must demand governments that serve their citizens, instead of serving Wall Street interests.
A man who won't die for something is not fit to live. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
A man can't ride your back unless it's bent. ~Martin Luther King, Jr.
RT @Fred__Nietzsche: Nihilism must direct the masses towards collective action; otherwise it will too be used and exploited by the enemy cl…
Workers of the world unite; you have nothing to lose but your chains. ~Karl Marx
The rich will do anything for the poor but get off their backs. ~Karl Marx
RT @How2GetFired: Send your boss an accidental text that says 'I think I know who the office snitch is.'
If voting changed anything, they'd make it illegal. ~Emma Goldman
No real social change has ever been brought about without a revolution... revolution is thought carried into action. ~Emma Goldman
RT @OvertDictionary: The Profit Margin: a measure of how far the corporation can squeeze profits out of the consumer and its employees.
You can kill a revolutionary but you can never kill the revolution. ~Fred Hampton
You can jail a Revolutionary, but you can't jail the Revolution. ~Huey Newton
The spirit of revolution will not die while the hearts of workers continue to beat. ~Ernst Toller
The only way to support a revolution is to make your own. ~Abbie Hoffman
RT @OvertDictionary: Blacks: a racist term, is it so hard to say African-American you racist?
I was born in revolution. ~Mary Harris Jones (Mother Jones)
The job of the writer is to make revolution irresistible. ~Toni Cade Bambara
RT @TextsToMyBoss: Who is more of an idiot, the boss or the people trying to become a boss? They're all fucking morons.
Revolution begins with the self, in the self. ~Toni Cade Bambara
We have not made the Revolution, the Revolution has made us. ~Georg Buchner
RT @Andy_WarhoI: The world needs artwork which shows how the mass media is nothing more than propaganda beamed at the masses.
Whoever finishes a revolution only halfway, digs his own grave. ~Georg Buchner
A revolution is an act of violence whereby one class shatters the authority of another. ~James MacGregor Burns
RT @Huey_PNewton: The people are ready to seize power.
A great revolution in just one single individual will help achieve a change in the destiny of a society. ~Daisaku Ikeda
Every revolution has its counterrevolution - that is a sign the revolution is for real. ~C. Wright Mills
All civilization has from time to time become a thin crust over a volcano of revolution. ~Henry Ellis
The main object of a revolution is the liberation of man... ~ Jean Genet
RT @WoIIstonecraft: The revolutionary girl sees plastic surgery as a method used to destroy the very authenticity of womankind.
Promise yourself to live your life as a revolution and not just a process of evolution. ~Anthony J. D'Angelo
To love without role, without power plays, is revolution. ~Rita Mae Brown
RT @WealthyFacts: In a survey of the world's billionaires 72% said world hunger is 'not really a problem'.
We used to think that revolutions are the cause of change. It is the other way around: change prepares the ground for revolution. ~Hoffer
If you want to know the theory and methods of revolution, you must take part in revolution. ~Mao Tse-Tung
RT @RebellingSlave: I will not spend my energy on mindless mass media entertainments.
A revolution is not a dinner party, or writing an essay, or painting a picture, or doing embroidery. ~Mao Tse-Tung
The seed of revolution is repression. ~Woodrow Wilson
RT @Shocking__Facts: 20 percent of the population in the developed nations were reported to consume 86 percent of the world's goods.
No thieves, no traitors, no interventionists! This time the revolution is for real! ~Fidel Castro
A revolution is not a bed of roses. ~Fidel Castro
RT @OvertDictionary: Reality Television Shows: False reality, a real reality television show would be a show about families being foreclose…
When dictatorship is a fact, revolution becomes a right. ~ Victor Hugo
You cannot make a revolution with silk gloves. ~ Joseph Stalin
RT @DearDrugAddicts: Drugs make you feel too paranoid to resist the power-structure.
Every time there's a revolution, it comes from somebody reading a book about revolution. ~Mike Tyson
Those who do not move, do not notice their chains. ~Rosa Luxemburg
RT @Dear__Teenagers: Your teachers are neither wise nor brilliant. They're paid by capitalist institutions to mold you into careerist slave…
The working classes in every country only learn to fight in the course of their struggles.~Rosa Luxemburg
The masses are the decisive element, they are the rock on which the final victory of the revolution will be built. ~Rosa Luxemburg
RT @Things_U_Need: Subversive behaviors, they will move your mind away from conformity towards the subversion of capitalist systems.
Capital is an historical necessity, but, so too, its grave digger, the socialist proletariat. ~Rosa Luxemburg
Freedom is always the freedom of dissenters.~Rosa Luxemburg
The way to crush the bourgeoisie is to grind them between the millstones of taxation and inflation.~Vladimir Lenin
The government is tottering. We must deal it the death blow an any cost. To delay action is the same as death.~Vladimir Lenin
RT @OvertDictionary: Sarah Palin: a woman who had managed to turn herself into the hero of the ignorant, the simple minded, the self-righte…
The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.~Vladimir Lenin
Sometimes - history needs a push.~Vladimir Lenin
RT @PoliticalLetter: Dear Religious Leaders: Stop using religion to brainwash the people in the interests of the ruling class.
Freedom in capitalist society always remains about the same as it was in ancient Greek republics: Freedom for slave owners. ~Vladimir Lenin
Fascism is capitalism in decay. ~Vladimir Lenin
RT @Babe__Ruth: The populace must reject all team (corporate) branding as a mere attempt to stamp the populace with mindless logos.
Can a nation be free if it oppresses other nations? It cannot. ~Vladimir Lenin
The privileged class can never be overturned peacefully. - Johann Most
RT @YgamblingSucks: Casinos are places where workers give back their hard-earned incomes to the corporate class.
Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable. -JFK
Above all, what socialist, without flushing with shame, maintains he is not a revolutionary? We say: none! ~ Johann Most
RT @Shocking__Facts: 3000 Wal-Mart workers are fired every year for as much as complaining to other workers about the low pay and lack of b…
Free speech is the whole thing, the whole ball game. Free speech is life itself. ~SalmanRushdie
Give me liberty or give me death. - Patrick Henry
How strangely will the Tools of a Tyrant pervert the plain Meaning of Words! - Samuel Adams
Capital is dead labor, which, vampire-like, lives only by sucking living labor, and lives the more, the more labor it sucks. - Karl Marx
RT @Who2Unfollow: Unfollow verified bloggers, why would you follow idiots who waste their writing skills on products and product reviews?
You show me a capitalist, and I'll show you a bloodsucker. ~Malcolm X
You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom. ~Malcolm X
